metadata.title: CVE-2021-22141 kibana: URL redirection flaw (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: An open redirect flaw was found in Kibana. An attacker is able to redirect a logged Kibana user to an arbitrary website by specially crafted URL.
            STATEMENT: OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) 4 delivered the kibana package but during the update to container first (openshift4/ose-logging-kibana6 since OCP 4.5) the kibana package is not maintained anymore, hence is marked as wontfix.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
kibana is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
